section.title: Overview
section.p: The category consumption order entity is used by the service operators to define the categories and their order of consumption. This entity is used to select the charging services.
A default category order is created at the time of NCC installation with the given values:

section.title: Configuration
section.p:
Log into the SM GUI, navigate to Policy & Charging Configuration > CHARGING tab and select the Category Consumption Order from the hamburger menu (

against the default category consumption order entity to modify the entity details as described in the following table:

note.p: The service operators can only edit the default category consumption order entity configuration. You cannot create or delete a category consumption order entity.

table.title: Parameters for category consumption order entity

row.entry: This parameter only displays the DefaultCategoryOrder name for the category order. You cannot modify the name of the default category consumption order entity.

entry.p: This parameter lists the categories defined in sequence by the service operators for consumption of the charging services.
In this list, the category order is created with DefaultCategory by default.
Click ADD ANOTHER CATEGORY to add a name for a new category order.
You can adjust the category list to define a new consumption order of the charging services.
